welanda yuddhaya saha aarthika jathikawadaye pipirima- loka samajawadi web adawiya welanda yuddhaya saha aarthika jathikawadaye pipirima nila niwedana ha prakashana thulata “aarakshanawadayata prathirodhaya dakwima” sandaha kapawana bawa kiyana sandahum athulath kirima eksath janapadaya wisin prathikshepa kirima arabaya, pradhana jathyanthara aarthika aayathanayan thula danata wasarakata pera gatumak pawathuni. 2008 goliya mulya arbudaya pupura yamata prathichara lesa jathyanthara mulya aramudala ha ji20 kandayama wani jathyanthara sanwidhana wisin mema wakyanshaya nirantharayen bhawitha karanu laba thibuni.
